duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote and showcase Beach Bum Beauty products to potential customers.
Organize and host events to introduce our products to a wider audience.
Utilize effective sales tactics and strategies to maximize sales opportunities.
Build strong relationships with customers, understanding their preferences and needs.
Refer and mentor new sales representatives to earn additional commission.
Stay up-to-date with product knowledge, features, and brand messaging.
Contribute to the overall success of the Beach Bum Beauty brand.
